      • getUserById

        @GetMapping(path="/users/{id}")
public User getUserById​(@PathVariable
                        int id)
        Finds a user in the database based on their id
        Parameters:
        id - User id
        Returns:
        The user with the given id

      • createUser

        @PostMapping(path="/register")
public java.lang.String createUser​(@RequestBody
                                   User user)
        Creates a new user and stores them as a query in the database. Calories is set to 0 by default.
        Parameters:
        user - User
        Returns:
        success or fail message

      • getUser

        @PostMapping(path="/login")
public java.lang.String getUser​(@RequestBody
                                User user)
        Logs in as a user. This method takes a user as a parameter (name, password, and calories which is set to 0 as default and finds an identical user in the database
        Parameters:
        user - User
        Returns:
        the id of the student in the database, or a failed message if not found

      • updateUser

        @PutMapping("/users/{id}")
public User updateUser​(@PathVariable
                       int id,
                       @RequestBody
                       User request)
        Takes an id and a user as a parameter and updates the information of the user with that id to the information of the user given in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        id - User id
        request - User info
        Returns:
        The new user information

      • deleteUser

        @DeleteMapping(path="/users/{id}")
public java.lang.String deleteUser​(@PathVariable
                                   int id)
        Finds a user with the given id in the database and deletes that query.
        Parameters:
        id - User id
        Returns:
        Success message

      • addFoodToUser

        @PutMapping("/users/{userId}/foods/{foodId}")
public java.lang.String addFoodToUser​(@PathVariable
                                      int userId,
                                      @PathVariable
                                      int foodId)
        Adds a food to a given user's profile. Takes in a user Id and a foodId and adds the food with the given id to the user with the giver user id.
        Parameters:
        userId - User id
        foodId - Food id
        Returns:
        Success or failure message

      • assignTrainerToUser

        @PutMapping("/users/{userId}/trainers/{trainerId}")
public java.lang.String assignTrainerToUser​(@PathVariable
                                            int userId,
                                            @PathVariable
                                            int trainerId)
        Assigns a trainer to a user. Takes a userId and a trainerId as parameters and assigns the user with the given userId to the trainer with the given trainerId
        Parameters:
        userId - User id
        trainerId - Trainer id
        Returns:
        Success or failure message
